name: A Fine Meal
description:
Oh, A Fine Meal can heal any Illnesses..!

Welcome to A Fine Meal where you play as a small plague doctor student who has to leave the house for the first time to go down into the village and buy ingredients for his sick mentor.

Except not all may be as it seems.

WASD - Move 

E - Interact

Extra credit:

Freesound for the freesounds (lmao)

Pixabay for sounds also

Beetchboi for coding help
